name: cond
docstring: Render one of two components based on a condition.

properties.name: cond
properties.description: The cond to determine which component to render.

properties.name: comp1
properties.description: The component to render if the cond is true.

properties.description:
Create a conditional component.

        Args:
            cond: The cond to determine which component to render.
            comp1: The component to render if the cond is true.

            The conditional component.
